attributes.review: Wow omg do NOT download this app. when i first opened the app, i was immediately assaulted with an image of a man so hideous my eyes started bleeding. his skin was bright orange and his body was built like an overweight bulldog. my eyes are still in pain and i think i will have permanent retinal damage😿😿
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter❤️

attributes.review: this app crashes and makes my phone glitch. it’s super laggy when you open it and doesn’t move from the home screen for HOURS. plus why support a president that only supports white straight males 👁👄👁
attributes.title: don’t get it

attributes.review: Yea this app just lags to much and keeps giving me annoying notifications that I don’t want to hear and it keeps crashing my phone and it’s just not a good app so I would not recommend downloading this app
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: I downloaded this and have never been happier. It’s helped me in understanding the Trump campaign. It’s lit
attributes.title: Great app

attributes.review: This is the most annoying app I’ve ever had, not only was it slow and crashed multiple times, it spammed notifications and even forced me out of a app, nobody download this and App Store.. Please delete this monstrosity of a app
attributes.title: Worst app and worst president

attributes.review: This app have me high hopes for the latest news in America, but in reality it was just a campaign app for Donald Trump. I was giving the app a try but all the news revolves around Donald Trump, nothing about anything else. If I could rate lower than a 1 Star, trust me, I would.
attributes.title: Unbelievably HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I am just astonished at how bad the software is on this app. There was a weird picture of an orange man and it just didn’t seem right, or professional. Not only that, my phone started glitching right after downloading! Do not use!!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: this app took forever to download. once i got it, all i could see was propaganda and lies. hopefully the developers update the app soon to include something better like idk....biden. as for now, i’m going to have to delete the app.
attributes.title: Slow download

attributes.review: This app is full of right-wing propaganda and hate speech! It is disgusting to see this blatant hatred towards other human beings. Donald Trump has not only caused a spark in hate crimes and a divide in America, but he has also been responsible for the 130,000+ Americans dead from Covid-19. This app has no place on the app store.
attributes.title: Fake News

attributes.review: This app should be taken down because when I open the app my phone said your getting hacked deleted this app now and my phone exploded I had to go to the hospital lost my arm and now I have to type this on my mom’s phone this app is 🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🗑🤡🤡🤡
attributes.title: Worst app EVER
